body_html:
I try to follow the advice in #1924 to compile a shared library. That worked fine. But there is hardly any documentation about how to work in an external project with the tensorflow_cc.so library.
Is there any example project, that shows how to compile projects with it? I'm mainly confused about which headers to include and where I can find them.
body_text:
I try to follow the advice in #1924 to compile a shared library. That worked fine. But there is hardly any documentation about how to work in an external project with the tensorflow_cc.so library.
Is there any example project, that shows how to compile projects with it? I'm mainly confused about which headers to include and where I can find them.
body:
I try to follow the advice in [#1924](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/1924) to compile a shared library. That worked fine. But there is hardly any documentation about how to work in an external project with the tensorflow_cc.so library.
Is there any example project, that shows how to compile projects with it? I'm mainly confused about which headers to include and where I can find them.
